member.name: T:FileFlows.Shared.ExtensionMethods
member.summary: Extension methods used by FileFlows

member.name: M:FileFlows.Shared.ExtensionMethods.ToJson(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts an object to a json string
member.returns: the object as json, or empty if object was null

member.name: M:FileFlows.Shared.ExtensionMethods.EmptyAsNull(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an empty string as null, otherwise returns the original string
member.returns: the string or null if empty

member.summary: Tries to find a match
member.param: The regex to use to find the match
The input string to find the match in

member.summary: Lower cases UPPER case characters, but does not touch umlauts etc

member.summary: Checks if two objects are equal

member.summary: Gets a hashcode of an object
